# KayGraph RAG Example Requirements

# Core dependency
kaygraph>=0.1.0

# Optional: For production implementations
# openai>=1.0.0         # For OpenAI embeddings
# cohere>=4.0.0         # For Cohere embeddings
# sentence-transformers>=2.2.0  # For local embeddings
# chromadb>=0.4.0       # For vector database
# pinecone-client>=2.2.0  # For Pinecone vector DB
# weaviate-client>=3.0.0  # For Weaviate vector DB
# anthropic>=0.18.0     # For Claude LLM
